summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6017 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Ladd's Second Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 13th Avenue South and 14th Avenue South from Nevada Street to Oregon Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81217, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
